sourcesContent:
<template>
  <st-panel>
    <st-form class="mg-t8" :form="form" labelWidth="125px">
      <discount-form
        v-model="formValue"
        :decorators="decorators"
        :form="form"
        :isSubmit="isSubmit"
        @change="onChange"
        @save="onSave"
        @submit="onSubmit"
      ></discount-form>
    </st-form>
  </st-panel>
</template>
<script>
import DiscountForm from '../components#/discount-form.vue'
import { ruleOptions } from '../components#/discount-form.config'
import { AddService } from './add.service'
import { pick } from 'lodash'

export default {
  name: 'BrandAppPluginDiscountAdd',
  bem: {
    b: 'brand-app-plugin-discount-add'
  },
  components: {
    DiscountForm
  },
  serviceInject() {
    return {
      service: AddService
    }
  },
  rxState() {
    return {
      loading: this.service.loading$
    }
  },
  data() {
    const form = this.$stForm.create()
    const decorators = form.decorators(ruleOptions)
    return {
      form,
      decorators,
      isSubmit: 0,
      formValue: {
        _isPass: true,
        activity_name: '',
        product_type: 1,
        product_id: '',
        limit_course_num: 0,
        discount_info: [], // {product_sku_id,  discount_price}
        start_time: null,
        end_time: null,
        is_limit_stock: 0,
        stock_num: 0,
        is_limit_buy: 0,
        buy_num: 0,
        description: ''
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$nextTick(() => {
      console.log('add-watch-formValue-change', { ...this.formValue })
      this.form.setFieldsValue({
        formValue: {
          product_type: this.formValue.product_type
        }
      })
    })
  },
  methods: {
    onChange(e) {
      console.log('add-formValue-change', e, { ...this.formValue })
    },
    onSave() {
      this.formValue._isPass = true
      this.isSubmit++
    },
    // 保存
    onSubmit(e, flag) {
      console.log('校验结果', e._isPass, flag)
      console.log('submit', { ...this.formValue, ...e })
      if (e._isPass) {
        this.service.addDiscount({ ...this.formValue, ...e }).subscribe(() => {
          this.$router.push({
            path: './list'
          })
        })
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
